description: Creates a new access key for the specified Amazon Lightsail bucket. Access keys consist of an access key ID and corresponding secret access key. Access keys grant full programmatic access to the specified bucket and its objects. You can have a maximum of two access keys per bucket. Use the GetBucketAccessKeys action to get a list of current access keys for a specific bucket. For more information about access keys, see Creating access keys for a bucket in Amazon Lightsail in the Amazon Lightsail Developer Guide.

parameters.name: bucketName
parameters.description: The name of the bucket that the new access key will belong to, and grant access to.

nested_items.name: accessKey
nested_items.description: An object that describes the access key that is created.

nested_items.name: accessKeyId
nested_items.description: The ID of the access key.

nested_items.name: secretAccessKey
nested_items.description: The secret access key used to sign requests.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the access key.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the access key was created.

nested_items.name: lastUsedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time when the access key was most recently used.

nested_items.name: region
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region where this access key was most recently used.

nested_items.name: serviceName
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon Web Services service with which this access key was most recently used.

nested_items.name: operations
nested_items.description: An array of objects that describe the result of the action, such as the status of the request, the timestamp of the request, and the resources affected by the request.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the operation.

nested_items.name: resourceName
nested_items.description: The resource name.

nested_items.name: resourceType
nested_items.description: The resource type.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the operation was initialized ( 1479816991.349).

nested_items.name: availabilityZone
nested_items.description: The Availability Zone. Follows the format us-east-2a (case-sensitive).

nested_items.name: regionName
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region name.

nested_items.name: isTerminal
nested_items.description: A Boolean value indicating whether the operation is terminal.

nested_items.name: operationDetails
nested_items.description: Details about the operation ( Debian-1GB-Ohio-1).

nested_items.name: operationType
nested_items.description: The type of operation.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the operation.

nested_items.name: statusChangedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the status was changed ( 1479816991.349).

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The error code.

nested_items.name: errorDetails
nested_items.description: The error details.
